name: Yellow Survivers
description:
Version: 0.3.0

This game was made by bastikadu. This is my first ever game! Would love some feedback.

PC Controls:

Movement - ASWD or Arrow Keys

Woosh (speed up) - SPACE

++ (40 seconds) - E

Reset - R

Menu - Q

Mobile Controls:

Movement - Move your finger over screen to move the ball

Goal

You objective is to collect the most coins as possible. 

Bombs

Bombs are vlack balls that become visible when the 15 second mark hits. Upon being the visible they do no harm, as they have to get gunpowder to expload first. This process takes 8 seconds. At the 7 second mark the baomb will turn black, and will kill the player on impact. Very difficult.
